title: UP Warriorz Finally Victorious: Navgire & Harris Power to Win Over Mumbai Indians in WPL 2024
content:
The UP Warriorz finally tasted victory in the Women's Premier League 2024, defeating the Mumbai Indians by seven wickets at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru. 

Kiran Navgire's blistering half-century (57 off 31) set the tone for the chase, striking six boundaries and four sixes. She and Alyssa Healy (32 off 28) put on a 94-run opening stand before Navgire was dismissed. Grace Harris then stepped up, smashing a quickfire 38 off 17 balls to seal the win for the Warriorz.

The victory was even sweeter for the Warriorz, who were struggling after losing their first two matches. This win showcased the power of Navgire and Harris, who proved they are forces to be reckoned with in the tournament.
author: Scroll Staff
